level1.title: Define an Innovation Vision
level1.description: Your organization lacks a clear vision for innovation. It is essential to start by defining an innovation strategy aligned with your business objectives.
actions: Organize innovation vision definition workshops with the executive committee
Identify 3-5 priority innovation areas aligned with company strategy
Define measurable innovation objectives over 1-3 years
Communicate the innovation vision to all teams
kpis: Percentage of employees knowing the innovation vision
Number of initiatives launched in line with the vision

level2.title: Structure the Innovation Strategy
level2.description: You have an emerging vision but it needs to be structured and integrated more deeply into your global strategy.
actions: Develop a detailed 3-5 year innovation roadmap
Integrate innovation into all business strategic plans
kpis: Number of innovation projects aligned with strategy

level3.title: Optimize Strategic Alignment
level3.description: Your innovation strategy is well defined. Focus on optimizing alignment and improving execution.
actions: Develop business impact metrics for innovation

level4.title: Strategic Excellence
level4.description: Your organization reaches strategic excellence. Focus on continuous innovation and anticipation.
actions: Create a trends and weak signals observatory
Develop your organization's influence on the ecosystem

level5.title: Innovation Leadership
level5.description: You are a recognized leader. Focus on ecosystem and influence to maintain your competitive advantage.
actions: Develop your role as sector thought leader
Create innovation standards for your industry
Mentor other organizations in their transformation
Invest in breakthrough innovation and emerging technologies
kpis: Return on investment of breakthrough innovations

level1.title: Structure Innovation Governance
level1.description: It is essential to establish an organizational structure dedicated to innovation with clear roles and responsibilities.
actions: Appoint an innovation manager or create a dedicated team
Define roles and responsibilities of each actor
Create an innovation steering committee with management
Establish clear decision processes for innovation
kpis: Number of people dedicated to innovation

level2.title: Professionalize the Organization
level2.description: Your innovation structure exists but needs to be professionalized and strengthened.
actions: Structure an innovation department with dedicated budget
Create cross-functional links between innovation and business units
kpis: Number of projects in the pipeline

level3.title: Optimize Governance
level3.description: Your governance is solid. Focus on process optimization and organizational agility.
actions: Create fast-track mechanisms for priority projects

level4.title: Advanced Governance
level4.description: Excellent governance. Focus on distributed innovation and collective intelligence.
kpis: Percentage of teams involved in innovation

level5.title: Organizational Excellence
level5.description: Your organization is exemplary. Focus on continuous innovation and external influence.
actions: Become a reference in innovation organization
Share your best practices with the ecosystem
